_header: Lord I bid both day and night
_description: Lord come to my feast — three couplets

BLHar7322.First Lines: Lord I bidde boȝe day & nythcum to my fest ȝat I haue dyth…
BLHar7322.Last Lines: …ȝif in þi sith i grace haue fondeȝif me Mi wille at ȝis stonde
BLHar7322.Note: Written as prose, inserted into Latin with Latin between couplets.
BLHar7322.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             Political, Religious and Love Poems, from Lambeth MS. 306 and other
                sources.
